mapper.update: update user_sys_error_log set createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fromType = #{fromtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mainUserId = #{mainuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, moduleName = #{modulename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, createTime, fromType, mainUserId, moduleName, nickName, userId, userName, remark from user_sys_error_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
